text: Burglars at Work Burglars at Work () is a 1904 French short crime film directed by Gaston Velle for Pathé Films. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1904 films Category:French films Category:French silent short films Category:French crime films Category:1900s crime films Category:Articles containing video clips Category:French black-and-white films
